citeinfo.title: The count of low-center ice wedge polygons in Alaska (1km)

descript.abstract: The raster calculates the count of all deduplicated low-center IWPs with their centroid falling within 1km resolution. (If the IWPs is overlaid by the 1km pixel BBOX, but their centroids falling outside, they won't be count in this pixel).
descript.purpose: This raster stores the total number of low-center IWPs in Alaska. Each pixel value shows the count of low-center IWPs within the 1km*1km area.

idinfo.useconst: This statistics is calculated based on IWP dataset from: https://arcticdata.io/catalog/view/doi:10.18739/A2KW57K57Users are encouraged to provide feedback regarding how they use this data and issues. Please reach out to the dataset contact or a member of the PDG team via support@arcticdata.io.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
